thread.title: Hilarious DIY Fails That Will Make You Feel Better About Yourself
thread.title_full: Hilarious DIY Fails That Will Make You Feel Better About Yourself

author: Selena John
title: Hilarious DIY Fails That Will Make You Feel Better About Yourself
text:
IN Lifestyle ON 24 Feb, 2017 Hilarious DIY Fails That Will Make You Feel Better About Yourself Share on twitter Follow Us On 
We've all been there at one point. Boredom sets in and you decide to go browsing on the internet. You stumble upon a cool DIY project and it's one that looks so incredible, you decide to try your hand at recreating a nifty touch to your home, but what you get instead is a hilarious epic fail. Hilarious DIY Fails That Will Make You Feel Better About Yourself 754 396 Hilarious DIY Fails DIY fails hilarious fails 1. Epic Nail Design Fail 
There's a reason why people pay to get their nails professionally done. Sometimes you just have to leave it to the pros or else you'll wind up looking like a catastrophe. 2. Not-So-Lace-Eggs 
Listen, it's perfectly normal if you want to make the most of your eggs, but you have to keep in mind some things take a delicate hand. 3. The Orange Flame 
The smell of orange wafting through your house might seem like an awesome aroma, but this person probably didn't anticipate almost setting their house on fire. 4. Winter Cap Gone Wrong 
Want to knit your own winter hat? That's cool but make sure you have enough wool or else you'll wind up looking like this guy. Not exactly stylish, right? 5. A Mess Of Leaves 
Sure, DIY swirl nails look like a cool idea, and it's definitely something worth bragging about, but if you're anything like this person, then it's not worth the headache of cleaning up. 7. The Button Bowl 
A bowl decorated with your loose buttons sounds like a cute idea. Just realise, if you don't execute it right, you might wind up with a funky looking platter instead. 8. Epic Toddler Swing Fail 
Keeping a toddler busy is hard enough as it is, so when you try out your next DIY project, make sure it's actually going to work before you injure your kid. 9. The Ultimate Crocheting Fail 
Want to make a cute crochet animal for your space? Before you start, you ought to take a crocheting course or two before you wind up with something that looks rather freaky. 10. Melted Crayon Disaster 
Melted crayons seem cute enough, but when this idea goes wrong, it looks like an absolute mess and nothing that you would want to display in your home. Have you done anything worse than this? others like
